CustomField.description: ** System Calculated Override ** Valid if the Sales Order Line is related to a "Subscription" Item. When checked, the system will automatically calculate the "Activation Date" based on conditions set on the selected "Subscription Plan". Defaults checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated Override ** Valid if the Sales Order Line is related to a "Subscription" Item. When checked, the system will automatically calculate the "Activation Date" based on conditions set on the selected "Subscription Plan". Defaults checked.
CustomField.label: Auto Calculate Activation Date
